title: SAFMR to MAR
text:
This map is generated using

Small Area Fair Market Rent from the Department of Housing and Urban Development for FY 2024 for two-bedroom unit
Two-Bedroom average rent for multi-family apartment complexes from CoStar for Q3 2023

CoStar data is aggregated to the zip code level and averaged for all complexes within the boundaries North Texas. The ‘Rent Difference’ metric calculates the difference between average rent for a zip code and SAFMR.
CoStar tracks properties with five or more units, data on smaller properties with 1-4 units is not reflected here.
